item.title: [PI] Adding zone's (ALLREADY DONE EVERYTHING)
item.dc:creator: @DingDongDing DingDongDing
item.description:
@DingDongDing wrote:

[size=24pt]NO I DIDNT SNIPPET THIS FROM MY SOURCE MY SOURCE IS HYBRID PVP IT DOENST GOT ALL OF THESE ZONES SO DONT SAY I SNIPPET FROM MY SOURCE ( IM NOT THE OWNER OF HYBRID PVP)[/size]

[size=18pt]I GIVE YOU GUYS PERMISSION TO PUT THIS ON ANOTHER SITE ONLY IF YOU GIVE ME FULL CREDITS!!![/size]

Is It Easy?
yes it is 0/10

What to do?
Just copy and paste

First and all i made ALL these zone’s on my own! SO DONT SAY I SNIPPET! These coords are from my server! So change it if you dont like the place!

So copy this command and paste it to commands.java

if (playerCommand.startsWith("skilling") && c.playerRights >= 0) { c.getPA().movePlayer(2803, 3430, 0); }

Now go to ObjectManager.java and add these

///////////////Skilling//////////////////// c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(2728, 2814, 3436, 1, 10); c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(8393, 2804, 3434, 1, 10); c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(6150, 2807, 3435, 1, 10); c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(9708, 2803, 3455, 1, 10); ///////////////EndSkilling////////////////
[size=14pt]
Welldone on Skilling Zone![/size]

[size=10pt]Donator Zone:[/size]
Go to commands.java and add these

if (playerCommand.startsWith("donorzone") && c.isDonator == 1){ c.getPA().movePlayer(3361, 3505, 0); }
Btw the c.isDonator depens maybe is it for you isMember

I Didnt Added Objects Begause didnt have time Sorry
But i give you guys the code for it

Let me explain:
2728 = Object ID
2814 = X Coord
3436 = Y Coord
And DO NOT TOUCH THE 1 AND 10!!!
[size=14pt]
Welldone on Donorzone![/size]

[size=10pt]Staffzone: [/size]

if (playerCommand.startsWith("staffzone") && playerRights >= 1) { c.getPA().movePlayer(2525, 4776, 0); }
Objects (put these in ObjectsManager.java)

//////////////// staffzone//////////////// c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(2654, 2795, 2975, 0, 10); c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(2213, 2795, 2972, 0, 10); /////////////// endstaffzone////////////////

[size=14pt]Welldone you got Staffzone![/size]

Credits:
100% DingDongDign : For Coding All Of These!

PS: I DIDNT SNIPPET!

Thx For Reading!

Read full topic
